ygData.subject: Re: <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: Arrrrgh!! I hate people who do stuff like that!  I wish I was on your server to help you.  The best thing to do and it will help stop him from doing it to
ygData.messageBody:
Arrrrgh!!

I hate people who do stuff like that! I wish I was on your server to help
you. The best thing to do and it will help stop him from doing it to
someone else is /petition a GM and talk to them. Tell them your story and
the guys char name. Keep at it until you get satisfaction and take it to
your server's head GM if need be. They (head GM) can restore you in a
couple ways. They can get your stuff back from a set save point prior to
your 'incident.' Please please talk to your Guide and GM staff and help
stop this guy from pulling this crap on the next person.

Grrr Bark Bark Grrr - jerks like that make me sick!!!

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 48 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

----- Original Message -----
From: Cranfill, Wendy <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 9:19 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot


> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Hello everyone :)
>
> Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can all remember
> not to make my mistakes. Last night, I made the mistake of consenting
> someone to drag Tani's corpse out of the Scryer room in Guk. Well, long
> story short, all my armor and weapons were stolen (punishment for
twinking,
> heh) by this guy.
